relation: Make computer think-times shorter and responses faster
Add multi-move undo and redo (previously one move only)
Improve the algorithm for computer opponent Newton
Make a new toolbar layout with a general-purpose stop-start button
Add optional pauses after computer moves or animation steps, to help new players understand how the game works
Major internal restructure and rewrite: involving separation of model, view, control and AI classes, new classes for Game and AI_Box and executing AI code on a separate thread
